document.heading: Boxing and Wrestling Commission Act of 1975

history.narrative: Law 1-20, the “Boxing and Wrestling Commission Act of 1975,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-26, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 1975, and June 17, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 11, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-31 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
